about_the_game:
Welcome back to court in the world where all anime genres exist at once, for this follow-up to NINA AQUILA: LEGAL EAGLE, SEASON ONE, and experience the next chapter of the NINA AQUILA: LEGAL EAGLE story!

Step into Nina's shoe's once again, and investigate new places in Fledge City as you seek to defend your client, who stands accused of a capital crime!

More courtroom drama! More sinister intrigue! More Gorditos!

And sparkly, sparkly magical girls!


  • Play a part in an exciting mystery story told over multiple hours
  • Investigate crime scenes & interrogate witnesses from a top-down perspective
  • Defend your client in court with evidence & cross-examination
  • Confront evil both in-and-out of the courtroom in exciting minigame sections
  • Customise your experience with accessibility; reduce visual intensity, turn off minigame difficulty and more!
  • Continue a unique hybrid of Visual Novel & 2D adventure game series that celebrates & parodies the Magical Girl anime genre

    Follow now, to receive regular updates as we develop the game!

content_descriptors.notes:
NINA AQUILA: LEGAL EAGLE, CHAPTER IV: SACRED FEATHERS contains some content that may not be considered appropriate for all ages, and in some cases may not be safe for work.

The game involves murder investigations, and although there is no graphic violence or gore, we would like to forewarn audiences who are particularly averse to themes concerning crime and murder that these are present within the story.

There is some mild nudity, typically framed in a humorous/cute manner. Several images exist of a character in poses & outfits that some audiences may find sexy/provocative.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux Distro
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter IV: "Sacred Feathers"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

short_description: NINA AQUILA is back for her brightest, boldest, most magical adventure yet!
